      • withResponseOptions

        public AbstractCreateFactorRequestBuilder withResponseOptions(O options)
                                                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: CreateFactorRequestBuilder
        Ensures that after a Factor is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified factors's options. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Specified by:
        withResponseOptions in interface CreateFactorRequestBuilder<T extends Factor,O extends FactorOptions>
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if options is null.
